description.value: This is the code indicates the maximum degree of local invasion into or through the bowel wall.

copyright.value: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement

display.value: pT3: Tumor invades through the muscularis propria into the subserosa or into non-peritonealized pericolic or perirectal tissues (colon/rectum)
pT4b: Tumour directly invades other organs or structures (colon/rectum) (finding)
